# Exercise 0

Install and load the <span class="pack">ggplot2</span> package.

# Exercise 1

Using the old faithful data set from base R (just called <span class="objclass">faithful</span>), create a scatterplot with the eruptions and waiting variables.


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(aes(x=waiting, y=eruptions), data=faithful) +
  geom_point()
```
